text: In case anyone else is looking for features like this, HS doesnâ€™t support this at the moment, but hopefully something in the future.

yeah it all turns out that this is because the HubSpot serverless function is running HubSpot node client version 1 beta, automations run 3.4 and the current latest stable is version 5. Engineering pinged me and said they are working on some ways for us to specify the HubSpotclient version to use.
